org.nasdanika.common

Class InterpolatingSource

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.nasdanika.common.InterpolatingSource
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Function<String,Object>

    public class InterpolatingSource
extends Object
implements Function<String,Object>
    This class converts value returned by the source as follows: * Lists are streamed to lists with converting values as explained below. * Maps are wrapped into Contexts using Context.wrap receiving a new instance of InterpolatingSource constructed from the Map's get. * Strings are wrapped into interpolating PropertyComputers.
    Author:
    Pavel

      • apply

        public Object apply(String key)

      • convert

        protected Object convert(Object value)
        Converts value. This implementation converts: * Map to Context. * List to a list of converted values. * String to an interpolating PropertyComputer.
        Parameters:
        value -
        Returns:
